name: KoodibooK
tag_list: photo, book, publish, 3d, social, share, print, photobook
overview:
KoodibooK allows anyone to quickly and easily create high quality photobooks which can be published on-line or printed by professional printers.

The KoodibooK mantra is “Create Once, Publish Anywhere” which describes their ambition of bringing together the worlds of print, mobile and on-line. KoodibooK provides access to a large range of local and web-based photo providers (such as Facebook and Flickr), a software application called KoodibooK Studio which allows you to quickly personalise your book and a cloud-based environment which lets you view, comment, rate, share, buy and eventually sell your books.

Access to photos wherever they are, printing via well known and top quality professional printers, their unique 3D preview technology and scalable 100% cloud-based are initial market differentiators.

The company is based in the World Heritage City of Bath in the UK.
